abstract: Five tips on improving your black-and-white photos from an expert, Vincent Versace.
snippet: Five tips on improving your black-and-white photos from an expert, Vincent Versace.
lead_paragraph: Vincent Versace is a purist when it comes to black-and-white photography. He is finishing his third how-to book on the subject, "From Oz to Kansas: Almost Every Black and White Conversion Technique Known to Man." For black-and-white done right, he is the man to go to.

headline.main: Five Tips for Great Black-and-White Photos
